mapper.select: SELECT id, name, type, fuel_type, consumption FROM car
SELECT id, name, type, fuel_type, consumption FROM car WHERE id = #{carId}
SELECT id, name, type, fuel_type, consumption FROM car WHERE upper(name) like upper(#{carName})
SELECT id, name, type, fuel_type, consumption FROM car WHERE upper(type) like upper(#{carType})
SELECT id, name, type, fuel_type, consumption FROM car WHERE upper(fuel_type) like upper(#{carFuelType})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (name, type, fuel_type, consumption) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{fuelType}, #{consumption})
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET (name, type, fuel_type, consumption) = (#{name}, #{type}, #{fuelType}, #{consumption}) WHERE car_id = #{id}
